name: Chocolate Wonderland
description:
Indulge in the world of premium couverture chocolates - the real deal - and
get hands on with the basics of artisanal chocolate making.

This delightful experience will have you indulge in premium chocolate sourced
from the best locations, and learn delectable chocolate recipes under the
guidance of expert chocolatiers.

name: Hula Harmony
description:
A toy that was once designed for recreation, hula hooping gradually took the
world by a storm, starting with the United States in the late 1950s. Today
hula hooping is not just a playful activity, but also a form of exercise and
artistic expression. A cultural phenomenon, influencing music, fashion, and
dance.

**_This experience will involve a guided introduction to hula hooping, tricks
and transitions and flow choreography through some fun activities!_**

name: The Art of Shibori
description:
An ancient Japanese textile art form, Shibori embodies both craftsmanship and
creative expression. Rooted in centuries of tradition, Shibori is more than
just a technique; it is a philosophy that embraces the beauty of imperfection
and the harmony between nature and human touch. This makes each outcome raw
and different from one another.

This experience is an appreciation of the art of slowing down, of modern-day
sensibilities still being relevant through age-old techniques, and of finding
beauty and inspiration in all things that surround us.

_**The experience includes trying your hand at 3 different Shibori techniques
to create your own customised design on a piece of fabric, under the guidance
of an expert.**_

name: The Craft of Mixology
description:
Discover the world of cocktails and spirits and learn how to balance your own
cocktail concoction under the guidance of expert mixologists.

The experience will include a quick introduction to different spirits,
cocktail making techniques, bar equipment, interesting garnishing tips along
with various stories and myths around cocktails and spirits.

name: Oasis Of Scents
description:
An ode to the masterful craft of perfume making and the country's best noses,
this experience will have you develop a discerning sense of smell, understand
the nuances of perfumery as a science and art, as well as how fragrances
passively contribute to our overall experiences to create a lasting memory.

_**The experience includes navigating through various fragrance notes to
formulate your own customised bottle of perfume, under the guidance of an
expert.**_

name: Spin City
description:
While the origin story of pole art is multifaceted, spanning across multiple
cultures and time periods, today pole dance is regarded as an art form
celebrated for its fusion of athleticism, grace, and creativity.

_**This experience is an immersion into the art of pole movement, looking
beyond its association with strip clubs to embracing it as a wonderful way to
move and stay fit.**_

name: Aerial Playground
description:
Inspired by ancient yogic traditions, Airo Yoga takes flight for the modern
explorer. Emerging in the 2000s, it reimagines classic poses with the playful
freedom of a custom-designed aerial hammock.

Airo Yoga, a specific style within Aerial Yoga, incorporates the flowing
sequences of Vinyasa yoga, the core control of Pilates, the thrill of
inversions, and the playful connection of acro play. The result creates a
truly exhilarating and accessible practice that uses Eastern philosophies to
offer a unique path to strength, mindfulness, and a joyful flight for all.

name: The Gooey Goodness
description:
A fortunate kitchen mishap in the early 1900s led to the creation of the
brownie—a dense, fudgy confection that soon became an American classic. This
delightful oversight of not including baking powder in a chocolate cake batter
resulted in a delectable hybrid of cake and cookie, celebrated for its rich
chocolate flavour and chewy texture.

Over the decades, brownies evolved into a beloved staple in bakeries and homes
alike. Bakers experimented with a variety of ingredients and flavours, from
classic nuts and caramel to modern twists like sea salt and espresso. Today,
brownies are an iconic comfort food enjoyed across continents, offering a
range of irresistible flavours and joy for people of all ages.

**Join us on a delightful discovery behind baking the perfect brownies and
learn to create rich, delectable brownies from scratch. Enjoy a hands-on
experience that combines tradition with creativity, and savour the sweet
rewards of your baking success in our Brownie Bakealong experience.**

name: Summit Seekers
description:
Stemming from an age-old human desire to reach new heights, rock climbing is
beyond just a fitness ritual. This beginner-friendly rock climbing experience
draws inspiration from climbing pioneers, the unending human quest to problem-
solve better and design thinking to equip you with the skills and confidence
to embark on your own climbing journey. Join us and discover a sport steeped
in storytelling, where the upward journey is as beautiful as the summit.

name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving
into the art of cooking and dining well, this experience helps you engage all
five senses when you're in the kitchen.

**_The theme for this cookalong is Pasta-making._**

  * **The cookalong** : Learn to make Pasta dough, 1 stuffed pasta , 1 flat pasta (Fettuccine). Learn how to knead the pasta dough, rest, roll and sheet out the dough into shapes.
  * **The demonstration** : Pesto & Arabiatta sauce. 

Participants will take home the pasta that is rolled out, with instructions on
how to cook it at home; you’ll also be sampling two pasta dishes which are
made at Toast & Tonic.
